jobDescription: Job SummaryThe Clinical Data Analyst serves as a resource for performance and operational analysis for the Organizational Performance Department, performs computer based clinical/operational data acquisition and analysis as requested, and maintains the database software programs utilized by Organizational Performance Department.Duties and ResponsibilitiesActs as System Administrator for programs used by Organizational Performance, assigning user rights or removing user rights.Acts as a resource relative to data and analysis, especially in relationship to quality, outcomes, clinical operations, and performance improvement.Education and QualificationsBaccalaureate Degree with coursework in Statistics, Business, or Public Health, or minimum of 15 years commiserate IT-related experienceExtensive knowledge of Windows-based applications, including Microsoft Access, Excel, Access and PowerPoint required.RHIA preferred.Two years background in hospital/healthcare setting preferred.Understands the Medical Staff and Hospital organizational structures with the result that policies are routed correctly, and inter-departmental issues vis-a-vie policies, are addressed.
